_header: While I was young and had courage
Note: For a very similar piece see 5712.
Subjects: carols, of mortality; transitoriness, of life
_description: A song of old age — three quatrains (aaab) with Latin caudae and 4-line burden: ‘The beste song as hit semeth me / Peccantem me cotidie’ (repeated)

BLAdd5665.First Lines:
While y was ȝonge & hadde carageI wolde play with grome
                    & page…
BLAdd5665.Last Lines:
…To thy mercy thow me restoreSaluum me fac
                    domine
